subject: Good onsite documentation on Learning Tests (Re: mocking 3rd party classes?)
msgSnippet: Hi, ... BTW, are there any good onsite documentation of Learning Tests?  The only ones I can find are Kent s TDDBE review pdf. # And JB s book only gives a
messageBody:
Hi,

> An alternative is to write simple Learning Tests against their (live)
> API, then use that information to program your mocks.
BTW, are there any good onsite documentation of Learning Tests? The
only ones I can find are Kent's TDDBE review pdf.

# And JB's book only gives a reference to Kent's book. B)

Best regards,
-- Shinobu Kawai

--
Shinobu Kawai <shinobu@..., shinobu@...>
